Don’t have enough time to sign
documents personally?
We have a super solution!
SaveInk lets you do this on distance!
No need to dash to the office at the most inappropriate moment, as our app will do everything instead of you! Just choose the ink color and sign everything in a few seconds!
Download on the
App Store

SaveInk will become the closest friend of yours! Why?

Signing documents on distance without visiting an office or meeting people personally is the best variant nowadays.

Each file may be shared via any messengers right from the application. No need to look for the saved in the storage copy.

The document may be edited before signing. We provided the user with the most common tools. You can crop, rotate or make it black and white.

What is so special about SaveInk?

You can save the signed document to use it afterward. Just choose the most appropriate format (PNG/PDF).
Total security! The application may be locked using any preferable methods - strong password, Touch ID, Face ID and so on.
Your sign may be customized the way you like! There are 3 different pens and 4 colors available. Do you want to use red ink? No problems!

Aren’t convinced yet? We have something for you!

It’s possible to upload files from Gallery or Camera, so it isn’t obligatory to scan a new document. You can use old ones too.
There is a special in-app archive, where you can find all the signed documents immediately!
Simple and intuitively understandable interface together with the huge amount of helpful tools will make the usage comfortable enough.
Start using SaveInk today

App Store
